name: Shoham Debnath
body:
# Welcome to My Homepage.

### About Me
I am a Junior Year undergraduate student pursuing Mining Engineering at Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur. I have varied interests, ranging from **Music** which includes playing tabla and drums (a beginner) to **Coding, Finance, Statistics, Data Analysis** and **Dramatics**. I am an avid reader and also a big TV series fan.
You can find my [Curriculum Vitae](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B1k7H9fVb3FZY1hUXy1uUHpwdkk/view?usp=sharing).


***

![Me.](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B1k7H9fVb3FZQVhvNWRpWS1ob0U/view?usp=sharing)
### Contact Me
You can find me on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/debnathshoham), [Quora](http://www.quora.com/Shoham-Debnath) or [mail](debnathshoham@gmail.com) me.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
